name: Men Navy Blue Graphic Printed Cotton Pure Cotton T-shirt
description:
Navy Blue graphic printed T-shirt, has a round neck, and short sleeves.

Decent quality t-shirt. I'm a 6ft skinny guy and M size was a good fit. If you like loose t-shirt then go for one size up otherwise the fir is good. One thing that I found oddly small was the arm length. For an M size I expected the arm length to be a couple of cms longer. Overall very good t-shirt.

name: Men Blue & White Colourblocked Pure Cotton Polo Collar T-shirt
description: Blue and White colourblocked T-shirt, has a polo collar, button closures, and short sleeves.

name: Men Navy Blue Mustard Yellow Colourblocked Polo
description: Navy Blue and Mustard yellow colourblocked T-shirt, has a polo collar, button closure and short sleeves.

name: Time Travlr Men Teal Blue Printed Round Neck Pure Cotton T-shirt
description: The feel of this Roadster tee is absolutely amazing thanks to the designer's use of cotton. Wear this teal piece many ways, with dark wash jeans, cuffed chinos and more.

name: Men Red Printed Slim Fit Replica Jersey V-Neck T-shirt
description: Genuine Puma Product! Only problem was that when i checked the size chart, M was ok for me but it was too tight. Later I exchanged it with size L and now it fits comfortably. It's advisable to order a size bigger than that mentioned in the size chart.

name: Puma by Hrithik Roshan Men Black & Grey Printed T-shirt
description: Swap your usual T-shirt with the HRX Men's Running T-shirt and feel your run become easier and more comfortable. Designed with Rapid Dry technology, it wicks away sweat to keep you cool and dry from start to finish.
